titles.title: Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009
Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to House Energy and Commerce

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare program.
